TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content:
I got the paypal mail and the Preorder / Donate confirmation, but I don't think I got anything after this. I ordered on August 12th, so this has been some time now...

I there any way to check if you are registered for the full version?

Edit: Got the confirmation mail. Thanks!

To add to the long, long list:

I got almost the same letter as everyone else, the difference being that it said '72 hours' instead of 24. Never received the confirmation, and I donated $7. I got the email on August 13th.
I have yet to receive my pre-order confirmation e-mail as well. I received the 'Thank you for your donation' e-mail on the 12th, but still no pre-order confirmation.

I too donated on the 12th ($7), and received the email

*********************************************

Thank you for your donation!

You can view the download link and information at:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=store;sa=myorders

If you've contributed 7.00 USD or more, you will receive an email confirming your pre-order in the next 24 hours

Thanks for your support and happy launching!

******************************************

But I have not received any sort of follow-up confirmation that I'm in the pre-order queue.
I donated on the 12th and have yet to receive a preorder confirmation.
I too have only received that first email. I'm still in need of the confirmation email.

All right, guys!

We are looking for you on the data.... so, you will get the e-mail confirmation very soon!

Cheers!

So, hey.

I donated 10usd on August the 15'th, got a confirmation from paypal, but nothing from you guys.

I double chcecked my spam folder, but I can't find it anywhere.

So, it'd be nice if you could look me up as well and send me a new one.

(Still, congrats! If you've got this many people with errors, I guess you guys have started getting a decent bit of cash out of this! ;D )

Just to add one more to the long list, I gave a $10 donation 10 days ago, got the first email from you guys, and one from paypal, but not a 'pre order'confirmation email. I guess I'm glad not to be the only one.

Hello, once again, a great game you have here, like many other people on here I donated 10 USD and got the paypal receipt, but have yet to receive any email from you folks. Eagerly awaiting the confirmation, keep up the good work. :3
I donated $10 a couple of days ago and still haven't received any emails at all.

I had donated $7 a couple of days ago from a paypal account under a different email and still have not received the confirmation for donation or pre-order emails. Although I do have the confirmation email from paypal.

I have now recieved my pre-order confirmation.

Thanks!

I also donated on the 12th and have yet to receive a preorder confirmation.

Edit: Received it this morning. Thanks!

I have my 'Thank you for you donation' email, and my receipt email from paypal, but no confirmation email. Paid $10 on the 13th.

Edit: Received confirmation email yesterday.

Donated on the 15th. Got the email from PayPal but no pre-order confirmation.

Update: Got my confirmation this morning - the 23rd
Donated on the 14th, no email except Paypal one.

donated $7 august 12, and 1 more august 13th

silly paypal with silly conversion rates
Paid $10 (USD), got mail from paypal, but nothing from Squad.
I donated 10$ on august 13th, and have not yet received my confirmation email, got the thanks for the donation email, and the same from paypal
It has been a week and I only recieved the paypal comfirmation mail. To make the payment I used a different email than the one I use for the forum

Thanks for letting us know this... some of you have had received the e-mail after your post, so we still working on that.

We are making sure that everyone who had preordered, receives their confirmation e-mail!

Cheers

Awesome. I received confirmation for my pre-order 10 minutes after posting in this thread. Not sure if you guys linked it to my forum account though.

EDIT:

Just noticed the store link, and my pre-order has indeed been linked to my forum account.
Both the forum store thing and my paypal transaction history show the payment/order as completed but I haven't received any email (not even from paypal). Just wondering if it got through
My confirmation e-mail just popped up. Thank you guys!
